DOC.brief_summary: The study is conducted in order to evaluate the performance of the NIT thrmometer by comparing the predictive measurement to equilibrium measurement and to make a final tuning to the thermometer algorithm.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of NIR (Non-Invasive Infrared) Thermometer Performance
DOC.criteria: Children 018 years old, with or without fever that arrive at the unit of emergency medicine in Schneider medical center. An informed Consent was signed by the patient or his guardian. The medical stuff decides that the patient can't participate.
